Table of Contents

Class ForwardSolverBase

Namespace
Vts.Modeling.ForwardSolvers
Assembly
Vts.dll

This is a base class for all forward solvers. It contains default (virtual) vectorization methods such that only the scalar solver methods must be implemented to create a new IForwardSolver-implementing class. Override these virtual methods to impose optimizations possible through vectorization.

public abstract class ForwardSolverBase : BindableObject, INotifyPropertyChangedPlus, IForwardSolver, INotifyPropertyChanged

ROfTheta(OpticalProperties, double)

Scalar ROfTheta function. Determines reflectance at polar angle theta

public virtual double ROfTheta(OpticalProperties op, double theta)

Parameters

op OpticalProperties

optical properties of the medium

theta double

polar angle of reflected photon

Returns

double

reflectance at given single set of optical properties and single polar angle theta
